titles.title: Electing Members and Delegates to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.
Electing Members and Delegates to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Elects majority Members to the House Committees on: (1) Armed Services; (2) Financial Services; (3) the Judiciary; (4) Natural Resources; (5) Science and Technology; and (6) Veterans' Affairs.
